root.name: Worms Pinball
root.description: OverviewWorms Pinball is a pinball game developed by Team17 and published by Atari SA for the PC and PlayStation platforms. Worms Pinball had a Dreamcast port that was planned but was ultimately scrapped before development was completed.Worms Pinball is actually the Worms content that was featured in Addiction Pinball, which was cut out and sold separately as a stand alone product.System RequirementsMinimum: A 100% Windows XP/Vista/7 compatible computer system
